response.overview: In the lives embedded within the fields and mountains of the Cordilleras, lies stories untold to the rest of the World. With its distinct wonders to the mouth-watering foods, Apayao remains a place full of culture and traditions that contribute to the place’s successful sustainable development. But these aren’t just mere traditions, but the experiences that the lives of the Yapayaos experienced. As they live in a place where diversity is integrated not just as a whole province, but also diversity takes place in their Tribe—‘Ya Tribu daya Isnag.
response.title: Ytribu
